channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef turns a garden cactus into nopales in 'Nopales Tacos', then in 'Sloppy Joes', Chef tries to keep his new apron clean. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Desert Island: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them. He realises he misses the sea.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Perfume: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The school roof has a leak again, so the children raise money for a new roof in 'Children's Fete', then in 'The Aquarium', Goldie the Goldfish is feeling lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns have unbelievable new neighbours in 'Paddington's New Neighbour', and in 'Paddington Makes the News', Paddington, Jonathan & Judy create a newspaper but need a front page story! (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington in 'Paddington Shares A Good Deed', then in 'Paddington Goes Green', Paddington learns about composting, and tries to grow flowers for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.
